question: The files stored on a secondary stage device are composed of a hierarchy of data. What does a record in a file contain?
A report generator is used to____________
Which command is used to remove an index from the database in SQL?
What is the name given to the database management system which is able to handle full text data, image data, audio and video?
The relational model uses some unfamiliar terminology. A tuple is equivalent to a____________-
An-owner-member set in the CODASYL specifications may have__________
options: only one member but many member occurrence
only one owner but many owner occurrences
more than one member but only one occurrence per member
answer: only one owner but many owner occurrences

question: Which of the following is not a logical data-base structure?
If the record management system allows you to edit values before they are recorded on disk, you can________
options: change the name of a field
correct spelling changes before they are recorded
change the width of a field
answer: correct spelling changes before they are recorded

question: A top-to-bottom relationship among the items in a database is established by a__________
A database management system___________
options: is a collection of programs for managing data in a single file
can do more than a record management system
allows simultaneous access to multiple files

question: Which of the following is a database administrator’s function?
In SQL, which command(s) is(are) used to enable/disable a database trigger?
Which of the following hardware components is the most important to the operation of a database management system?
Which of the following is not a relational database?
The data dictionary tells the DBMS_________
options: what attribute are possessed by the data
what files are in the database

question: The PROJECT command will create new table that has___________
options: more rows than the original table
all the fields of master table
more fields than the original table

question: Primitive operations common to all record management systems include____________
Which two files are used during operation of the DBMS?
options: data manipulation language and query language

question: In a _____ a parent record type can be linked to one or more “child” record types, but a child record type can have only one parent.
Sort/report generators_________
options: require more disk space than index/report generators
do not need to sort before generating a report
answer: require more disk space than index/report generators

question: Each of data files has a _____ that describe the way the data is stored in the file.
To have a file hold a list, it is necessary to________
options: identify the records in the list
decide which fields will be used as sort or index keys
identify the name, width and type of the fields of each record

question: Periodically adding, changing and deleting file records is called file__________
After you _____ a record, many data management the environments require you to issue a command to save the changes you made.
Sophisticated report generators can________
options: selectively retrieve and print portions of a list

question: In SQL, which command is used to make permanent changes made by statements issue since the beginning of a transaction?
What is the language used by most of the DBMSs for helping their users to access data?
A network schema__________
options: restricts the structure to a one-to-many relationship

question: When using a database management system, the first thing that you must do is to____________
options: load the Software into your microcomputer
keep a floppy disk in readiness
answer: load the software into your micro¬computer
